select a.id as plantId, a.block_id as blockId, b.title as greenTitle, b.img as greenImg, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.operator, a.phone from block_plant as a join green as b on a.green_id = b.id join block_detail as c on a.block_id = c.id where c.till_id != 0 and c.user_id = #{userId} and a.`status` = #{status} order by a.create_time desc
